title: Alefaa-Bitcon
author: Alefaa-Bitcon
created_time: August 07, 2022, 06:16:46 PMLast edit: September 30, 2022, 04:30:08 PM by Alefaa-Bitcon
content: [ANN]ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥[ABTC] Alefaa-Bitcoin -ðŸ”¥ Pre-ICO StartedðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥Dear investors and users of the cryptocurrencies,We are happy to announce that the Pre-ICO of Alefaa-Bitcoin has started.Whether you want to invest as an early bird or to involve in our bounty programs, you are all welcome.Alefaa Blockchain will use up to 50% of the business profits to buy ABTC back from the market. This is the best way to reward ABTC stakeholders and the community of Alefaa blockchain.Blockchain has much more meaning than just a decentralized technology. Join us, and letâ€™s build our future together!Please visit our websites for more information about Alefaa-Bitcoin and its business projects.www.Alefaa.comwww.Alefaa.orgReach out to the management of Alefaa Blockchain via e-mail:info@Alefaa.comAlefaa Blockchain in Alefaa Media:AlefaaBook.comhttps://alefaabook.com/groups/view/18/alefaa-bitcoinYouVideoo.com (Under Construction)https://youvideoo.com/channel/19Download the Whitepaper of Alefaa-Bitcoinhttps://alefaa.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/SALE-OF-ALEFAA-BITCOIN-AGREEMENT-ABTC-2022.pdfPre-ICO sale updates:ABTC Investment Agreement Management - Publichttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EpKM7yvgPaP0o7fRgddcdTwLM6qukXdw/edit#gid=1034294194Pre-ICO Sale - August 1st â€“ October31st 2022Total ABTC for sale â€“ 500,000 ABTCAccepted currency â€“ USDT,BUSD/Bank Wire TransferTotal CAP â€“ $2,500,000 USD400 ABTC sold on August 1st, 2022Total 400 ABTC sold.Official post link in BitcoinTalki.orghttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409023.new#newTelgram Grouphttps://t.me/AlefaaBitcoinWelcome to join the official channel in Discord.https://discord.gg/zkmFtAxVDaFor the bounty program of TalkiHero, pls join the channel of DiscordFor learners: https://discord.gg/vJS3wnuYU2For tutors: Â  https://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7GhtPlease note: We have different bounty programs to offer for anyone to earn ABTC, but not to hire anyone as full time/part time employee(s), please donâ€™t contact us for paid work, thanks for your understanding.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Does Alefaa-Bitcoin(ABTC) not have a Twitter account yet?The team member information on your official website has also not been linked to their Linkedin account or other social media accounts.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on August 07, 2022, 11:32:02 PMDoes Alefaa-Bitcoin(ABTC) not have a Twitter account yet?The team member information on your official website has also not been linked to their Linkedin account or other social media accounts.Hi,We have our own Alefaa media, so we don't use other media, we are building and using our own medias, although some of them are under construction.The "Blesshare", has the features of Twitter, but with much more features, it would be online in time according to the schedule.We will check if there are some links that weren't removed for Twitter/FB â€¦Letâ€™s build our future together!Thanks.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon

comments.body: Telegram group created, welcome to talk with us. English ONLY.https://t.me/+mfPbRlijCHE5MjcxLetâ€™s build our future together!

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: August 09, 2022, 12:07:23 AMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 01:12:09 PM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: [ANN]ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥[ABTC] Alefaa-Bitcoin -ðŸ”¥ Pre-ICO StartedðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥Dear investors and users of the cryptocurrencies,We are happy to announce that the Pre-ICO of Alefaa-Bitcoin has started.Alefaa-Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency that uses a Layer 1 type of blockchain. The testnet started on July 1st, 2022, and the mainnet will begin on September 21st, 2022. ABTC is a digital store of value supported by the 12 and more Alefaa blockchain business projects.Whether you want to invest as an early bird or to involve in our bounty programs, you are all welcome.Alefaa Blockchain will use up to 50% of the business profits to buy ABTC back from the market. This is the best way to reward ABTC stakeholders and the community of Alefaa blockchain.Blockchain has much more meaning than just a decentralized technology. Join us, and letâ€™s build our future together!Please visit our websites for more information about Alefaa-Bitcoin and its business projects.www.Alefaa.comwww.Alefaa.orgReach out to the management of Alefaa Blockchain via e-mail:info@Alefaa.comAlefaa Blockchain in Alefaa Media:AlefaaBook.comhttps://alefaabook.com/groups/view/18/alefaa-bitcoinYouVideoo.com (Under Construction)https://youvideoo.com/channel/19Download the Whitepaper of Alefaa-Bitcoinhttps://alefaa.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/SALE-OF-ALEFAA-BITCOIN-AGREEMENT-ABTC-2022.pdfPre-ICO sale updates:ABTC Investment Agreement Management - Publichttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EpKM7yvgPaP0o7fRgddcdTwLM6qukXdw/edit#gid=1034294194Pre-ICO Sale - August 1st â€“ October31st 2022Total ABTC for sale â€“ 500,000 000 ETNY ðŸ”¹Accepted currency â€“ USDT,BUSD/Bank Wire TransferTotal CAP â€“ $2,500,000 USD400 ABTC sold on August 1st, 2022Total 400 ABTC sold.Official post link in BitcoinTalki.orghttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409023.new#newPls Note: Only this official post will be replied by the Alfeaa-Bitcoin management.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5409023.new#newTelgram Grouphttps://t.me/+mfPbRlijCHE5MjcxWelcome to join the official channel in Discord.https://discord.gg/zkmFtAxVDaFor the bounty program of TalkiHero, pls join the channel of DiscordFor learners: https://discord.gg/zNJdEnJMFor tutors: Â  https://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7Ght

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Quote from: Alefaa-Bitcon on August 08, 2022, 12:57:35 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on August 07, 2022, 11:32:02 PMDoes Alefaa-Bitcoin(ABTC) not have a Twitter account yet?The team member information on your official website has also not been linked to their Linkedin account or other social media accounts.Hi,We have our own Alefaa media, so we don't use other media, we are building and using our own medias, although some of them are under construction.The "Blesshare", has the features of Twitter, but with much more features, it would be online in time according to the schedule.We will check if there are some links that weren't removed for Twitter/FB â€¦Letâ€™s build our future together!Thanks.If you really want to build a social media platform, that's great, but getting a lot of users isn't easy, because now there are many social media platforms with their respective features.but I think there is nothing wrong if Alefaa has a social media account such as twitter, it makes it easier for you to provide updates to your community, can also be used for promotions

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on August 09, 2022, 12:08:15 PMQuote from: Alefaa-Bitcon on August 08, 2022, 12:57:35 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on August 07, 2022, 11:32:02 PMDoes Alefaa-Bitcoin(ABTC) not have a Twitter account yet?The team member information on your official website has also not been linked to their Linkedin account or other social media accounts.Hi,We have our own Alefaa media, so we don't use other media, we are building and using our own medias, although some of them are under construction.The "Blesshare", has the features of Twitter, but with much more features, it would be online in time according to the schedule.We will check if there are some links that weren't removed for Twitter/FB â€¦Letâ€™s build our future together!Thanks.If you really want to build a social media platform, that's great, but getting a lot of users isn't easy, because now there are many social media platforms with their respective features.but I think there is nothing wrong if Alefaa has a social media account such as twitter, it makes it easier for you to provide updates to your community, can also be used for promotionsHi, thanks for your advice, our team will focus on rewarding people who will use Alefaa medias, you might be the one.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.created_time: August 09, 2022, 01:52:29 PMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 03:26:28 PM by Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Dear Alefaa-Bitcoin users, please check the mining reward plan as followshttps://alefaa.org/abtc-mining-reward-planBackground InformationThe Testnet is valid from July 1st, 2022 to September 20th, 2022;The total of 19,000,000 of ABTC will be pre-mined and Mainnet will be live on September 21st, 2022;The total of 2,000,000 ABTC will be mined from September 21st, 2022, to September, 2140;A total of 77,777.77 ABTC will be rewarded to the early investors and the management team on September 21st, 2022;The price of the ABTC will be started at $10/ABTC in reward plans for the marketing and management team, the price for reward plans will be adjusted each year according to the market price of ABTC.All 19,000,000 ABTC will be frozen until they are distributed as reward to any users or the management team according to the related reward plan.For example:On Sep.21st, 2022, a total of 77,777.77 ABTC rewarded to the co-founders and the management team, plus the awarded amount to TalkiHero.com or any other program before Sep.21, 2022 will be circulated in the market;All the left balance of 19 million ABTC will be frozen unless they are distributed in different reward plans.We expect we will have much less ABTC to be awarded in the ABTC reward plans when the price of ABTC increases, so this means we expect the circulated ABTC will be less than Bitcoin.ABTC Minging Reward PlanA miner should do his/her best to promote the Alefaa business projects, it will include one of the following marketing work:Register and organize a group in Alefaabook.com to be used as the business promotion management with group members;The miner should lead their team members to help Alefaa blockchain business project, including, but not limited to: Invite friends to promote Alefaabook.com;Refer tutors/learners to TalkiHero.com;Any other Alefaa business projects in the near future.FAQ for ABTC mining reward plan:Do you have a time limit for the mining reward plan?No, we donâ€™t set any time limit for this reward plan, even after September 18th, 2022, we will keep the mining reward plan to continue.What kind of PC could be eligible for mining ABTC?Any PC/Laptop could work, and the mining will not affect anything for you to use your/PC/Laptop to proceed with any other tasks.Whatâ€™s the key to winning the application as a miner?The following factors will decide if you can get your minerâ€™s application approved:A.To promote any business of ABTC, and share the work in Alefaa.com;B. To submit your application as early as possible;C. Keep promoting Alefaa business, this may take only 10 minutes per day.When will the miner start to mine?On or after September 21st, 2022Who can apply as a miner?AnyoneUp to what consanguinity is the close family member not eligible for the application?We do not allow up to the 3rd degree of consanguinity, which includes your Husband and Wife (this includes common-law relationships), son/daughter, father/mother, grandfather/grandmother.Why do you ask for the IP address in the application?We are using the service of cloudflare.com, which allow us to authorize the IP address to visit a specific weblink, this means, only authorized IP addresses can mine as we only people who have access to a pool can mine ABTC. This will avoid the 51% attack, as each miner is registered, anyone using a higher hash rate to attack the ABTC blockchain, the company will sue him/her for the potential loss. And this will save the mining power, as we force all miners to use CPU to mine ABTC, not GPU or ASICs.Is it safe to share the IP address?Yes, itâ€™s just for mining authorization purposes, and we will keep the IP address confidential. And itâ€™s safe to share the IP address, you can ask your ISP to confirm the risk to share your IP, you will get the same answer.How can I submit my application form as a miner?Please use the following form to submit your application:https://forms.gle/rNsnadUt8BAwRR4s6When will I know if my application is approved?We will contact you by email when your application is approved.What email should I contact if I have any questions?info@alefaa.com

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on August 09, 2022, 12:08:15 PMIf you really want to build a social media platform, that's great, but getting a lot of users isn't easy, because now there are many social media platforms with their respective features.but I think there is nothing wrong if Alefaa has a social media account such as twitter, it makes it easier for you to provide updates to your community, can also be used for promotionsBack in time, facebook, twitter and other popular social medias right now did not exist yet or the moment they exist they only have small users but that didn't discourage them. Same with the new projects. If they will get discouraged thinking there are late in the game then how can they will know if they will succeed or not?Also, social medias that are in the mainstream are centralized but I think the one that they are building here is decentralized because it deals with crypto and blockchain. Isn't that great? Many people right now are into that so projects like this still has a chance. In the meantime it is not wrong to use common social medias, for advertising purposes only.

This is the best way to reward ABTC stakeholders and the community of Alefaa blockchain.Blockchain has much more meaning than just a decentralized technology. Same with the new projects. If they will get discouraged thinking there are late in the game then how can they will know if they will succeed or not?Also, social medias that are in the mainstream are centralized but I think the one that they are building here is decentralized because it deals with crypto and blockchain. Thanks for your comments

comments.author: sssergy2705
comments.body: Quote from: Alefaa-Bitcon on August 09, 2022, 01:52:29 PMWhy do you ask for the IP address in the application?We are using the service of cloudflare.com, which allow us to authorize the IP address to visit a specific weblink, this means, only authorized IP addresses can mine as we only people who have access to a pool can mine ABTC. This will avoid the 51% attack, as each miner is registered, anyone using a higher hash rate to attack the ABTC blockchain, the company will sue him/her for the potential loss. And this will save the mining power, as we force all miners to use CPU to mine ABTC, not GPU or ASICs.Is it safe to share the IP address?Yes, itâ€™s just for mining authorization purposes, and we will keep the IP address confidential. And itâ€™s safe to share the IP address, you can ask your ISP to confirm the risk to share your IP, you will get the same answer.How can I submit my application form as a miner?Please use the following form to submit your application:https://[Suspicious link removed]/3PHzzg5When will I know if my application is approved?We will contact you by email when your application is approved.What email should I contact if I have any questions?info@alefaa.comNot all people have a white IP address.Most providers provide a "gray" IP address.What to do in this case?And your link has been removed by the forum as suspicious.

comments.author: Alefaa-Bitcon
comments.body: Quote from: sssergy2705 on August 10, 2022, 06:47:32 PMQuote from: Alefaa-Bitcon on August 09, 2022, 01:52:29 PMWhy do you ask for the IP address in the application?We are using the service of cloudflare.com, which allow us to authorize the IP address to visit a specific weblink, this means, only authorized IP addresses can mine as we only people who have access to a pool can mine ABTC. This will avoid the 51% attack, as each miner is registered, anyone using a higher hash rate to attack the ABTC blockchain, the company will sue him/her for the potential loss. And this will save the mining power, as we force all miners to use CPU to mine ABTC, not GPU or ASICs.Is it safe to share the IP address?Yes, itâ€™s just for mining authorization purposes, and we will keep the IP address confidential. And itâ€™s safe to share the IP address, you can ask your ISP to confirm the risk to share your IP, you will get the same answer.How can I submit my application form as a miner?Please use the following form to submit your application:https://[Suspicious link removed]/3PHzzg5When will I know if my application is approved?We will contact you by email when your application is approved.What email should I contact if I have any questions?info@alefaa.comNot all people have a white IP address.Most providers provide a "gray" IP address.What to do in this case?And your link has been removed by the forum as suspicious.Oh, we created a form in Google Drive, it's just an application form, so we might need to create a page in the website, not in the Google drive, thanks for your remind.I think you misunderstood in this case, we will keep the pool of the ABTC private, not the public can visit to void the public to mine ABTC, as we want the miners to use CPU to mine, not the GPU/ASICs, so only whitelisted IP can mine. This doesn't mean we need to whitelist the IPs for any others websites of Alefaa Blockchain.

comments.body: Update Aug.14We are happy to announce that the ABTC bounty program for TalkiHero.com has started!!!Bounty program for learnershttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1Iq-uN03qQNnEPiVTWD5WvXpwcfHYNiAK/viewBounty program for tutorshttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1lUSZ7dCUYCZJZ9bflWa5nZHwvBWaG-U7/viewDiscord for the bounty program for learnershttps://discord.com/invite/mCwM4dfAWmDiscord for the bounty program for tutorshttps://discord.com/invite/Dhn3tH7GhtPlease note: You need to submit this application first before your referred tutor is registered on TalkiHero.com.https://forms.gle/Q8St9gyQN34yf6nB9Contact us: info@alefaa.com
